post.body: I needed someone local to get me to the ER, where I already am. But thanks!
thank you. I will definately keep that in miind. They're hopeful that I will be home Sunday or Monday.
No. I've broken out in a random fever with chills and intense pain and I'm home alone. I'm scared and don't know what to do.
that's what happens when you urinate powdery substances.
But other people's ordeals are full of leather and and sexy stuff. Mine never look that way.
You can sing to any one of my rubber ducks. I have a bunch.
Welcome back!
And when you use smelly bath stuff, what does it smell like?
are you a shower or bath person?
Do I detect a note of sorrow in your voice? Do you wish there to be powder emittage?
prairie.
what color?
totally metal
hands above the waist, I swear!
I am in the hospital, in a fairly swank private room (with dvd player?). Fever is back, waiting for pain meds.
It feels weird that y'all are up and starting your day. I haven't really slept at all.
Doc thinks it could be a pleural effusion. I feel like I'm on House. I just hope no one stabs me in the chest.
Chest Xray says no lung clot. Still in ER waiting for transport to hospital. (Went to extension ER). Feeling doped up but better.
Being admitted to Shady Grove for observation. Might have a clot, or infection, or both.
FYI: I have someone coming over. All will be well.
Is someone who lives locally to me on yim or gchat?
I'm tired of everyone else getting the sexy ordeals. My ordeals are things like rubber ducks and bad internet videos.
Frito pie by delivery; Good chili, soggy soggy ass fritos.
I am having hot Lushie chat with a hot Lushie lady. Just sayin'.
Feeling pretty lousy, but mostly from lack of sleep. Really tired of all of this health malarky now.
I am so sexy right now. CPAP mask, iv, Corona boxer shorts, black t shirt, half passed out on the couch under a pink/black quilt.
I got a cheese hat.
Sometimes I think about all the lifestyle changes I've made and wonder if it was all a waste, considering that my body just finds new ills.
I accidently dyed part of my right eyebrow. It's this weird greyish streak.
Also, been watching The Wire all day. On season 2 and still can't decide if I like it or not.
Still awake, but painmed combo seems to be helping with the pain. Had a bit of a freakout about always being the one in/out the hospital.
Sitting at home, giving myself pain meds and hoping for the best.
Change of heart. ER very, very full. Going home and waiting it out. If things don't get better, we go later.
Going to the ER. Running a low grade fever all day, not good when you're on AB for infection. Wish us luck.
Spending a lazy sat sitting around watching The Wire. I can't decide if I like it or not. Napping off and on.
I need friends with more entertaining insomnia so there are funny tweets to read while waking up.
Very confused. Made the exec decision to maintain the status quo and call the dr on Monday.
I got "sir"ed at the hospital twice. And I wasn't binding or anything. Have to admit, it made me smile.
Thinking about cute people is just like "resting", right?
Story: ID doc thought PICC line was infected, and original infection not healing. Sent me for tests. Tests say I am doing ok, so I'm home.
